name: High-Speed Hominids
description:
A cross between Ultrakill/Titanfall 2, and a Racing/Speedrunning game. High-Speed Hominids is a multiplayer 'Shmoover' (movement-shooter) about racing other gorillas to escape. To make sure we really encourage speed and movement tech we replicated the Source Engine's movement and physics extremely closely, allowing tech like air-strafing and B-Hopping.

Up to 4 players "Ape Out" and try to escape first and with the highest score. How you kill an enemy changes the points value. Additionally, enemies sometimes drop 'Burn Cards'. These either help them (I.E. Doubling weapon ammo), or slow down their opponents (Such as 'Lefty Flip', which briefly inverts/uninverts an opponents look controls)
